name: rls_disabled_in_public
title: RLS Disabled in Public
description: Detects cases where row level security (RLS) has not been enabled on tables in schemas exposed to PostgREST
detail: Table \`public.spec_filters\` is public, but RLS has not been enabled.

name: rls_references_user_metadata
title: RLS references user metadata
description: Detects when Supabase Auth user_metadata is referenced insecurely in a row level security (RLS) policy.
detail: Table \`public.general_settings\` has a row level security policy \`Admin can manage general settings\` that references Supabase Auth \`user_metadata\`. \`user_metadata\` is editable by end users and should never be used in a security context.
